summary: Ralph D. Muller, NMT, faced charges of unprofessional conduct, incompetence, and failure to cooperate with a Board investigation. Allegations included making sexist, racist, and anti-Semitic comments to co-workers and patients, alongside repeated non-compliance with Board orders for evaluation and interviews. An Order of Default was issued following his failure to attend a prehearing conference, leading to the revocation of his nuclear medicine technology license.
